title.default: ON SALE for Christmas + New Year 2023

message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 9,000 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v21.3.9, in the latest version, we have implemented important functions such as Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, during 2022.12.23 ~ 2023.1.2, the Double 12 Shopping Festival, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at $21.99, is discounted to $13.99.
message.zh:
在 2022.12.24 ~ 2023.1.2 新年期间，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
